programme.title: PL: Bolton v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/96. With a huge trip to Newcastle looming, United looked to keep the pressure on at the top by beating struggling Bolton.

programme.title: PL: United v Sunderland 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/96. United took on Sunderland for the first time in the Premier League on what was to be a memorable afternoon at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: Nottm Forest v United 98/99
programme.desc: United Archives 6/2/99. Former United boss Ron Atkinson was hoping to get one over his old club when they visited the City Ground with Forest deep in relegation trouble.

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Better Off Wed: The kids learn that Dr. Colosso ruined their parents' wedding years earlier, and want to recreate Hank & Barb's dream day as their anniversary gift. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Parks & T-Rex: Preoccupied with Z-Force training, Phoebe & Max learn that they've forgotten special family events. Wanting to make it up, Phoebe plans a family fun day. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Cat's New Boyfriend: When Tori finds out that Cat is dating her ex-boyfriend, her jealousy could ruin their relationship. Trina uses fish to make everyone's feet super smooth. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Hungry for a Duel: The battle between Team Yuga and Team Roa enters the second duel! Gavin must face a surprise opponent - Romin! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Valiant Hercule, Work A Miracle! A Challenge From Outer Space!: Continuing to fight despite being limited to Super Saiyan form, Goku is knocked out by Beerus, who prepares to destroy Earth. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: He Who Wears The Clown: After trying on the nose of a clown, Owen learns that this is how clowns are made. He's stuck as a clown until he can trick someone into asking to try on the nose. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Us 'r' Toys: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Grody To The Maximum: Cody gets a super cool new t-shirt. It's so cool that the kids don't even recognise him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Wiggin' Out: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Upside Of Hunger: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced to outwit himself in order to get his cake back. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Fire In The Hole: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Tu Ba Or Not Tu Ba: The class tries to help Chef achieve his dream of joining the world's most famous Tuba Band, Tubalicious, only to regret it when they realise how much they'll miss him. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cactus Makes Perfect: Cody's friends become concerned when he forms a new friendship with a cactus. (S3 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Virtual Reality Bites: When the school switches to virtual reality, Harold uses the opportunity to get the respect he feels he rightfully deserves. (S3 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Opening Act: After failing to open a jar Chef believes he's entering his twilight years. This prompts Beth and the kids to dig up something from his youth to rejuvenate him. (S3 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Van Hogling: Chef and the kids take a field trip to Sugar's farm, but ignoring all of Sugar's strict and boring farm rules has dire consequences. (S3 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ticking Crime Bomb: Leshawna and Izzy trick Owen into thinking he's destined to be a criminal mastermind, but when he joins the scariest gang in town they have to mount a rescue attempt. (S3 Ep42)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Synchro / Out of Sync: The Tikis must team up with the Mirages, and worse: Hannah and Corto must fly in sync to win. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Great Belugaga Race: After a nice compliment from Corto, Debbie becomes her number one fan and decides to leave the Starfish team. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Midsummer Bear's Dream: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight but is woken up by the Lemmings blasting music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Manufacturing Secret: Grizzy has run out of chocolate spread. He realises that the Lemmings are making their own. If they can make it, then why can't he? But first, he needs the recipe! (S1 Ep43)

programme.desc: Owain sy'n mynd a'r cyflwynydd, dylanwadwr ar actifydd, Jess Davies, ar Daith Bywyd. Owain Llyr Williams takes the presenter, influencer and activist, Jess Davies, on her life journey.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Mae symptomau dau gi yn peri penbleth i Kate y fet, Scampi'r gath angen triniaeth gymhleth ar ol ffeit a Dolly'r Schnauzer angen tynnu dannedd! It's all about the dogs and a cat today!

programme.title: Y Sn
programme.desc: Yn y bennod hon: hybu cerddoriaeth Cymru mewn sawl ffordd greadigol, cip ar brosiect ffotograffiaeth, a golwg ar waith cymunedol yn Wrecsam. This time: music, photography and community arts.

programme.title: Am Dro
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cawn deithiau o amgylch: arfordir Porth Amlwch; y rhaeadrau ger Abergwyngregyn; Llanfihangel ar Arth; a Carn Meini yn y Preseli. Four walks, four competitors, but only one winner.

programme.title: Yr Ynys - Ciwba
programme.desc: Heddiw bydd Cerys Matthews yn teithio i Giwba. Cerys Matthews travels to Cuba and meets people living the socialist reality on the world's only communist island.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Dewi Prysor sy'n ymweld ag amrywiaeth o'r hen lysoedd Cymreig yng Ngwynedd. Dewi visits the locations of some of the courts of Gwynedd and explains Edward I's policy of wiping them out.

programme.title: Ralio: Sardinia
programme.desc: Cymal cyffro 6ed rownd Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd o Sardinia. Live Power Stage action from Rally Italia Sardegna, the sixth round of the World Rally Championship from Sardinia.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Bydd Meinir yn ymweld ffermwyr sydd wedi dioddef o droseddau cefn gwlad ac Alun yng nghanol y gwartheg Salers. Nia discovers the impact of the bluetongue virus on Welsh agricultural shows.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Hafiach
programme.desc: Wedi ffeindio'r corff, mae'r criw yn cwestiynu pwy yw'r bachgen, a beth ddigwyddodd iddo? A oes un o'r criw yn gwybod? Is the finger being pointed in the crew's direction regarding the body?

programme.title: New: Tafwyl 2025
programme.desc: Perfformiadau byw o'r brif lwyfan a'r Tafiliwn, sgyrsiau gydag artistiaid a perfformiadau cerddorol egsgliwsif yn yr ardd gudd. Day 2 highlights at Tafwyl: live performances & interviews.

programme.title: New: Tafwyl 2025: Fleur De Lys
programme.desc: Ymunwch Huw, Tara a Lloyd yn Tafwyl ym Mharc Bute i fwynhau set fyw Fleur de Lys. Join Huw Stephens, Tara Bethan and Lloyd Lewis at Tafwyl festival to enjoy a live set by Fleur de Lys.

programme.title: Dylan ar Daith
programme.desc: Mae Dylan Iorwerth yn teithio i'r dwyrain i Delhi, Darjeeling ac Assam, lle'r aeth menyw ifanc o Borthaethwy yn genhades ym 1916. Dylan finds out about a Welsh missionary from Anglesey.

programme.title: Bois y Rhondda
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r bois yn agor lan am bwysigrwydd teulu a ffrindiau - a chariadon wrth gwrs! This time the boys open up about the importance of family and friends - and girlfriends of course!

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod hyfryd ac mae'r Harbwr Feistr yn penderfynu tanio ei fan hufen i, Mistar Rhewllyd. It's a lovely day so the Harbour Master fires up his ice cream van. But it needs oil!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Tybed pam bod dysgu sut mae lifer yn gweithio yn arwain at wneud amser bath yr anifeiliaid yn hwyl a sbri? Blero finds out how levers work, causing bathtime to start with a splash.

programme.title: Kim a Ct a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Ct ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Ct on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau ar saffari! Ond pan mae pethau'n mynd yn fwdlyd, allen nhw gwblhau'r safari? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are on safari!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad gwlad sy'n llawn coedwigoedd glaw trofannol a mynyddoedd hudol: Periw. Peru: We learn about the history of the Incas, about 'Machu Picchu' & an animal called a Vicuna.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Daniel wedi syrffedu ar fod yng nghysgod y Jet-lu, ac yn penderfynu dod yn arwr hefyd. Daniel Jones is fed up with being in the shadow of the Jet-lu. He decides to become a hero too.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Meurig y gath a Jini a'u cheffylau. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Today we meet Meurig the cat and Jini and her horses.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae angen help ar yr Olobobs i dyfu eu hadau Tan-tws, felly maen nhw'n creu Sblishwr Sbloshlyd i'w helpu. A Sblishwr Sbloshlyd splasher helps the Olobobs to grow some poptato seeds.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliad bach y byd, ac anifeiliaid sy'n hoffi hongian o'r coed yw'r ystlym a'r tarsier. The bat and tarsier are animals that like to hang out of trees.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Ar ei ddiwrnod mawr bydd Huw'n teithio i Sir Fon ac yn gobeithio gwireddu ei freuddwyd o gyfarfod a chyffwrdd a neidr. On his big day Huw hopes to meet and touch a snake.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw nid yw'n gwybod pam fod ei ben yn brifo. Pablo can't work out why his head hurts until Noa realises his symptoms sound like a volcano.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad bod y peiriant golchi dillad wedi torri. Mae e'n sylwi nad oes trydan gan fod y tyrbein gwynt wedi stopio. Harri gets a call that the washing machine is broken.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Gwyrdd yn weithiwr araf a phwyllog. Tybed a all ddarbwyllo Enfys i weithio'r un ffordd? Baba Gwyrdd works slowly and surely. Can Enfys be persuaded to work in the same way?

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae pawb yng Nghwmtwrch wedi cyffroi wrth i Twrch ffeindio map sy'n dynodi fod trysor yn y dref. Mystic mole Twrch Trwythog has found a map which denotes that there is treasure in the town.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae. Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Gwiber yn perswadio Crawc i ddefnyddio ei mwd adfywiol er mwyn cael ei lun ar glawr blaen cylchgrawn Arwyr Glan yr Afon. Gwiber convinces Crawc that her mud has a healing quality.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri yn cwrdd a theulu sy'n mwynhau Geocashio, ac mae Jeno a'i theulu yn ymweld a Bwlch Nant yr Arian. Today, Huw joins a group of children keeping the village of Llanberis tidy.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn dewis lliwiau ar gyfer eu tai chwarae. Red and Blue choose colours for their playhouses.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon fe awn ni i'r haul i ddweud helo i'r llew ac i'r oerfel i gwrdd 'r pengwin. We take to the sun to say hello to the lion and to the cold to meet the penguin.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Tomi Broch wedi cael llond bol ar y tywydd oer ac mae'n mynd i gynhesu o flaen y tn yn nhy Benja. When Tomi Broch decides he's had enough of the cold he takes shelter by the fire.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo eisiau gwybod beth sy'n digwydd ym mhennod nesaf ei hoff sioe deledu, ac mae ef a'r anifeiliaid yn mynd ar daith am yr ateb. Pablo wants to know more about his fave TV programme.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Awn yn ol i'r flwyddyn 1804 i ddysgu am y trn stem cyntaf a gafodd ei ddefnyddio yng Nghymru, yn Merthyr Tudful. We return to 1804 to learn about the first ever steam train.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn teithio ar y Pip Cyflym... trn sy'n teithio ar draws Pentre Papur Pop! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are aboard the Zip Express.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn yn cwrdd ag archeolegydd sy'n cloddio mewn mynwent ger y Barri. An unusual hockey team in Cardiff is looking for new players of all ages, and we'll also hear your stories.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Aled Samuel a Bethan Scorey sy'n edrych ar gartrefi Cymru drwy'r oesoedd. Y tro hwn byddwn yn edrych ar dai o'r cyfnod Edwardaidd. This time we focus on houses from the Edwardian period. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Heno, byddwn yn dod yn fyw o Tafwyl, Gwyl Gymraeg Caerdydd. Tonight, we'll be coming live from Tafwyl, Cardiff's Welsh Festival.

programme.title: Hewlfa Drysor
programme.desc: Lisa Angharad a'r Welsh Whisperer sy'n mynd a'u "Hewlfa Drysor" i Lanerfyl i gynnal cystadleuaeth sy'n codi'r cythraul yn eu cynefin. This time, we take the "Hewlfa Drysor" to Llanerfyl.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Dylan ar Daith
programme.desc: Mae Dylan Iorwerth yn teithio i'r dwyrain i Delhi, Darjeeling ac Assam, lle'r aeth menyw ifanc o Borthaethwy yn genhades ym 1916. Dylan finds out about a Welsh missionary from Anglesey.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Du a Gwyn yn paentio dinas gyda help eu ffrind newydd, Llwyd. Black and White colour a city with the help of new friend, Grey.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Dorti'n cael diwrnod rhyfedd wrth sylwi fod pawb yn ei hanwybyddu a bod popeth o chwith. Dorti is having a strange day, with everyone ignoring her and everything is going wrong.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Ceir Cwl. Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am bopeth sy'n ymwneud cheir, ac ewn i Unol Daleithiau America i ddysgu am Henry Ford. In this episode we'll learn about cars.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Wedi i Jason ddyfeisio Pelydr Gwrth-Ddisgyrchiant ma Jetboi'n benderfynol mai ei declyn personol o fydd hwn. Jason invents an Anti-Gravity Ray and Jet-boy wants to make it his personal tool.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Li Ban
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Li Ban heddiw? What's happening in the world of Li Ban today?

programme.title: Tekkers
programme.desc: Cystadleuaeth pl-droed gyda Heledd Anna, Lloyd Lewis a Huw Owen yn herio dau dm mewn pum gm gorfforol. This time, the two teams are from Ysgol Gymraeg Caerffili - but who will win?

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Dan arweiniad Heledd a Dylan bydd Gwyn a Mary yn cael treulio amser gyda dau gi o dan olwg ein cameru cudd. This time, Gwyn and Mary spend time with two dogs, filmed by our hidden cameras.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Ioan yn cael lwc wrth geisio hel tystiolaeth am ei fai ar gam, a Huw yn flin gythreulig am y peth. Anna feels that Mair is belittling her relationship with Miles.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Y Byd ar Bedwar
programme.desc: Nest Jenkins sy'n dilyn taith un teulu i Benidorm wrth iddynt chwilio am atebion ar l colli'u brawd. We follow one family to Benidorm as they search for answers after losing their brother.

programme.title: New: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Gan ei bod hi'n wythnos ymwybyddiaeth y rhosyn, mae Sioned yn creu trefniant yn cynnwys y blodyn poblogaidd. Meinir tackles seasonal jobs in the garden, and Adam visits Aberglasney Gardens.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Rhifyn arbennig: Awn i Orllewin Awstralia i gwrdd Dafydd Jones a adawodd Dwyran 15 mlynedd nl efo mond 150 yn ei boced. We travel to Western Australia to meet an enterprising Welshman.

programme.title: Yr Ynys: Cyprus
programme.desc: Beti George sydd yn mynd ni ar daith i gwrdd rhai o drigolion Cyprus - y Groegwyr yn y de a'r Twrciaid yn y gogledd. Beti George takes us to Cyprus to meet Greeks and Turks living there.

programme.title: Confessions from a Holiday Camp
programme.desc: 1977. Comedy. Directed by Norman Cohen. Stars Anthony Booth, Robin Askwith & Bill Maynard. Holiday camp employees enjoy their summer celebrations until a new manager arrives to spoil the fun.

programme.title: The Falcon and the Snowman
programme.desc: 1985. Drama. Directed by John Schlesinger. Stars Timothy Hutton, Sean Penn & Joyce Van Patten. The true story of two childhood friends who decide to sell government secrets to the Soviet Union. [S]

programme.title: Avalanche
programme.desc: 1969. Family. Directed by John Danischewsky. Stars Howard Marion-Crawford & Totti Truman Taylor. A group of children on a skiing holiday find themselves in trouble when one of them breaks his leg. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Doctor on Call
programme.desc: 1964. A look at the services that doctors provide, with a focus on a team that goes out with a flying doctor to the remote areas of jungle in Malaya.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Sheep Dogs/Gun Collection. 1981. On a bitterly cold day, Jack Hargreaves travels to Wales for a sheep dog trial. Back in Hampshire he visits a collection of guns from the 'wild west' of America. [S]

programme.title: Strange Invaders
programme.desc: 1983. Sci-fi. Directed by Michael Laughlin. Stars Paul Le Mat, Nancy Allen & Diana Scarwid. A professor travels to a strange town to investigate the mysterious disappearance of his ex-wife. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: Caribbean Carousel. 1966. A magnificent cruise around the Caribbean on the SS Antilles, with a glimpse of a number of destinations including Barbados, Jamaica and Martinique.

programme.title: The Gallant Hours
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directed by Robert Montgomery. Stars James Cagney & Dennis Weaver. The story of Admiral William F. Halsey as he fought to turn the tide against the Japanese during World War II. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Saves Drydale's Marriage. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Raymond Bailey & Irene Ryan. Drysdale's marriage is threatened by a misunderstanding when he looks for a housekeeper while his wife is away. [S]

programme.title: The Restless Breed
programme.desc: 1957. Western. Director: Allan Dwan. Stars Scott Brady, Anne Bancroft, Jay C. Flippen. A young lawyer travels to Mission, a small Texas border town, to even the score for the murder of his father. [S]

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge
programme.desc: Worzel Pays a Visit. 1979. Stars Jon Pertwee, Mike Berry & Una Stubbs. When Worzel finds out that the runaway Aunt Sally is working as a housemaid at Mrs. Bloomsbury-Barton's, he decides to visit. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Impractical Joker. 1966. Stars Adam West & Cesar Romero. The Joker vandalises a number of key objects around Gotham. Commissioner Gordon calls Batman and Robin to solve the enigmatic clues. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout June. [S]

programme.title: Adam Had Four Sons
programme.desc: 1941. Drama. Directed by Gregory Ratoff. Stars Ingrid Bergman, Susan Hayward & Warner Baxter. A French governess becomes the centre of a wealthy family after the death of her employer's wife. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Drummers of the Queen
programme.desc: 1964. A spotlight is put on the Junior Guardsmen's Company, which teaches drumming among other trades.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Hue and Cry. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, John Arnatt & Kevin Stoney. When the Deputy Sheriff's chain of office is stolen, he threatens to kill a group of villagers if the perpetrator isn't found. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Forest Fire/Farm Sale/Fishing in a Gale. 1986. Jack Hargreaves reflects on his large collection of country films made during his long career in television and chooses three more to show us. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: It's a Goon Show Special! Mike and Noel share some interesting rare lost reels from the Goon Preservation Society, and there's a special guest! And do you remember making an Origami Rupert? [S]

programme.title: Assignment K
programme.desc: 1968. Thriller. Directed by Val Guest. Stars Stephen Boyd, Camilla Sparv & Michael Redgrave. A toy manufacturer, who doubles as a British Intelligence Agent, becomes entangled with European spies. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: Pop singer Wayne Gibson performs the phenomenal hit I Like It.

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: The Reluctant Witness. Stars John Gregson, Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. Some neighborhood thugs who run a stolen car ring beat a man to death. A timid shop girl is the only witness. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club
programme.desc: Episode 29. 1975. Ray Ellington and his Quartet perform 'I Could Have Danced All Night' and 'Tit Willow'. The Grumbleweeds and Frank Carson also make appearances. [S]

programme.title: Night of the Demon
programme.desc: (AKA Curse of the Demon) 1957. Horror. Director: Jacques Tourneur. Stars Dana Andrews, Peggy Cummins & Niall MacGinnis. A professor arrives in London and investigates a devil worshipper. [S]

programme.title: Budgie

programme.title: The Rogues
programme.desc: 1965. The Project Man. Gig Young, David Niven and Charles Boyer are The Rogues, members of two related families of international forgers and conmen. [S]

programme.title: The Texan

programme.title: The Larkins

programme.title: The Gorbals Story
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Stars Howard Connell & Russell Hunter. A Merton Park Studios Production. A young artist is almost driven to murder from the pressures of living in the Glasgow slum area. [S]

programme.title: Inquest

programme.title: Impulse (1955)

programme.title: Dick Barton at Bay

programme.title: An Honourable Murder

programme.title: Sleeping Car To Trieste

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies

programme.title: Scotland Yard
